articles.title: Stock futures inch higher after tech-driven sell-off: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Stocks sold off in Tuesday’s regular session, spurred by profit-taking in Big Tech names and worries about the Federal Reserve’s rate cuts.
articles.content:
U.S. stock futures rose on Wednesday. The action comes after a sharp decline in Big Tech stocks and renewed fears over the path of rate cuts spurred a sell-off on Wall Street.
